availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George R. Clements (Union County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah Clements in Union County on May 27, 1856. Father of Martha A. Clements, Louisa Clements, Susan Clements, and Charles R. Clements. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Employed John Seay as a laborer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 361.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County, Fredericksburg Precinct, p. 293A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #000562202, p. 580.
Find A Grave, "G. R. Clements (1832-1915)," Memorial #104413710, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/104413710 (accessed January 23, 2020).
